original_text: And his brethren by their families, when the genealogy of their generations was reckoned, were the chief, Jeiel, and Zechariah,
korean_text: 그의 형제가 종족과 계보대로 우두머리 된 자는 여이엘과 스가랴와

sentences.original_text: And his brethren by their families,
when the genealogy of their generations was reckoned,
were the chief, Jeiel, and Zechariah,
